Description:
**UNDER OFFER / UNDER CONTRACT**
HUNT CLUB ESTATE, CRANBOURNE EAST: This iconic development was the original estate that set the trend for Cranbourne East and has been the go-to pocket for growing families ever since!
7 Reynard Place is set deep within the estate and is located within moments of buses, walking trails, parkland, lakes and both the Cranbourne Estate primary and secondary schools. The local Hunt Club Village will prove to be very handy with all required amenities literally at your finger tips.
Sure to appeal to both occupiers and investors alike, the property itself features a central entrance way that leads you to the spacious lounge and dining rooms complete with gas heating and split system air-conditioning.
The hostess kitchen offers stainless steel appliances, whilst there are 3 robed bedrooms including the master with a walk in wardrobe and a pristine ensuite to match the family bathroom and second toilet.
Step outside and be greeted by a remote double garage with internal access and a spacious backyard providing plenty of opportunities to entertain and relax using the pergola and the decking that runs down the side of the premises.
The Hunt Club is a multi award winning development offering a complete range of education facilities and even includes a childcare centre. Public transport constantly weaves through the estate and don't forget the future plans for a Cranbourne East railway station.
Centrally located to freeways en route to the Melbourne CBD, the location is second to none. For those of you who like to stay closer to home, it's only a brisk drive to the Cranbourne Park shopping centre, Berwick Village and the Fountain Gate shopping precinct. Within close vicinity to an array of additional primary, secondary and tertiary institutions, the entire family will have easy access to the very best in entertainment, education and recreation!
